channel.title: Crown help [renamed]
channel.description:
well i just added custom crowns and im getting a stupid bug with my admin crown..when u talk in regular chat as an admin, it shows as mod crown but when u talk in clan chat\pm it shows correctly.. [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/32925315/error.png[/img]
heres my client.java.
http://pastebin.com/6bTAQ2w4
pastebinned as its too long for a forum post
can anyone fix?:\ any help is appreciated. thanks
